seniority_level.evidence: 3-5+ years experience required with complex technical requirements including SAP, process mining platforms, and multiple data platforms suggests senior level despite no 'Senior' in title

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' and core responsibilities focus on data pipelines, ETL/ELT, and data modeling

sub_specialty.evidence: Role specifically focused on Process Intelligence with process mining platforms, PQL, and event log enrichment mentioned as core requirements

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of direct reports, team leadership, or management responsibilities; focused on technical execution and platform ownership

primary_cloud.evidence: No specific cloud providers mentioned; only data platforms like Databricks and Snowflake which are cloud-agnostic

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned at all

processing_paradigm.evidence: Mentions both batch ETL/ELT work and streaming technologies (Kafka) as nice-to-have, suggesting both paradigms are relevant

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tools mentioned in the job posting

storage_layer.evidence: Databricks and Snowflake mentioned as major data platforms, both are primarily data warehouse technologies

remote_restriction.evidence: Hybrid model with Amsterdam HQ mentioned suggests preference for European timezone proximity, though flexibility is offered

timezone_focus.evidence: Amsterdam headquarters location and international team mentioned suggest European timezone focus

relocation_required.evidence: Hybrid/remote flexibility mentioned and no relocation requirements stated

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned and location is Netherlands, suggesting local work authorization preferred

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support and European location suggests work authorization requirements

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship requirements mentioned, suggesting work authorization in Netherlands/Europe is sufficient

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position with benefits mentioned suggests W2 employment structure

benefits_level.evidence: Competitive compensation, development opportunities, and ownership mentioned but no premium benefits like unlimited PTO or equity explicitly stated

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'development opportunities' and 'ownership from day one' but no specific career tracks or promotion paths detailed

mentorship_signals.evidence: International team mentioned with opportunities to 'grow, innovate' suggests collaborative learning environment

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit promotion or advancement paths mentioned in the job description

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities

career_tracks_available.evidence: Focus on technical expertise and platform ownership suggests IC track, but no management or specialist tracks explicitly mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between must-haves (SQL, ETL, SAP, Python) and nice-to-haves (PQL, Kafka) with balanced language

scope_definition.evidence: Focused data engineering role for process intelligence with well-defined responsibilities and technical requirements

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skills required (3-5+ years, SQL, Python, SAP experience) are reasonable and appropriate for senior data engineer level
